fault-code.action: check Tomcat(Web server) service amd check Archiving connection(or mode)
fault-code.consequence: Will not get any data from archive
fault-code.problem-description: Can not get the reference to the archive or error from the archive is received

fault-code.action: Check the Control subsystem log or error message or check Control subsystem status
fault-code.consequence: Some component of Control subsystem can not work may cause unexpected result
fault-code.problem-description: tries to use the control system components and gets an error from the control system

fault-code.cause: Control subsystem Problem. Array can not be used
fault-code.action: Check the Control subsystem log or error message or check array alarm/log/error
fault-code.consequence: Some array component of Control subsystem can not work may cause unexpected result
fault-code.problem-description: attempts to use its array components and receives an error

fault-code.action: Check the Control subsystem log or error message which cause the ExecBlockEndedEvent sent
fault-code.problem-description: attempt the to do a ExecBlock observation, but Control subsystem send a ExecBlockEndedEvent.

fault-code.cause: Some component of the MasterScheduler not work
fault-code.problem-description: Scheduling get an error from MasterScheduler
